name: Give City Joy 2012 Holiday cards
description:
This season, send your holiday greetings with 100cameras and Give Joy by sending a card that helps empower children around the world to create a better future for themselves and their community. 

Your purchase of these cards empowers 100cameras to continue the powerful mission of giving children around the globe the skill of photography to enable them to raise funds for the needs of their community.

4.13" x 5.82"
16pt, FSC credited paper stock

Questions or larger quantity orders contact yes@100cameras.org

name: project001: Sudan Greeting Card Set
description:
Say what you’re thinking through the power of an image, and help a child at the same time. We’re convinced that words never had so much power! 

These images were taken by children from St. Bartholomew’s Orphanage in South Sudan; purchasing this greeting card set sends lifeline supplies to their orphanage.  

set of 6 | 4.13" x 5.82" |16pt, FSC credited paper stock

cards included: "thank you.", "getwell.", "i love you.", "happy birthday.", "thinking of you.", "the best day." & "I miss you."

Note: All orders are shipped on Thursdays, unless otherwise requested.

name: project002: New York Greeting Card Set
description:
Say what you’re thinking through the power of an image, and help a child at the same time. We’re convinced that words never had so much power! 

These images were taken by inner-city children living in New York City. Purchasing this greeting card set gives educational tools to these children’s local community center: the New Life of NYC Community Center on the Lower East Side of Manhattan.


set of 6 | 4.13" x 5.82" |16pt, FSC credited paper stock

cards included: "thank you.", "getwell.", "i love you.", "happy birthday.", "thinking of you.", "the best day." & "I miss you."

Note: All orders are shipped on Thursdays, unless otherwise requested.

name: project003: Cuba Greeting Card Set
description:
Say what you’re thinking through the power of an image, and help a child at the same time. We’re convinced that words never had so much power! 

These images were taken by underprivileged children in Cuba. Purchasing this greeting card set sends medical supplies to the Campo Amor Community Center that serves these children and their community. 

set of 6 | 4.13" x 5.82" |16pt, FSC credited paper stock

cards included: "thank you.", "getwell.", "i love you.", "happy birthday.", "thinking of you.", "the best day." & "I miss you."

Note: All orders are shipped on Thursdays, unless otherwise requested.

name: project001: S. Sudan Notecard Set
description:
This crafty set of 6 greeting cards was created with all of your creative correspondence needs in mind. These photos were taken by orphans in South Sudan, and 100% of your purchase of this greeting card set will be used to empower sustainable growth in their community through our on-the-ground partner  providing medicine, food, education, & basic humanitarian needs. These images tell their stories. Use the set to mail your own thoughts and wishes or gift the set to your favorites. Give Photography and Change their Community.

4.13" x 5.82"
16pt, FSC credited paper stock


*All orders will ship on Thursdays. Note your order should be placed by 5pm on Wednesday to hit the mail that week.

name: "Photographer."      Shirt
description:
Wear it loud. Wear it proud.

Sport the Power of Photography! Because 100% of the proceeds ($20) from this tee will further the mission of 100cameras to empower marginalized children around the world to create positive change in their communities. 


Note: All orders are shipped on Thursdays, unless otherwise requested.

name: "Give Photography" Shirts
description: Note: All orders are shipped on Thursdays, unless otherwise requested.

name: 100camears. Logo Shirt
description:
We’d like to introduce you to our favorite tee. Your purchase of the logo tee will enable 100cameras to teach photography to more children and create positive change for more communities around the world. And thus helping us create a global perspective. Go ahead! Give this a wear.  We're convinced that you won’t find a comfier shirt in all the lands.  

The Track Shirt made by: American Apparel
50% Poly, 25% Combed Cotton, 25% Rayon
Unisex size Shirts. 

Note: All orders are shipped on Thursdays, unless otherwise requested.

name: 100cameras. photographers notecards
description:
This crafty set of 6 greeting cards was created with all of your creative correspondence needs in mind.  All cards in this set include images of our photographers and capture the core of the 100cameras mission. Own this set to mail your thoughts and wishes or gift it as a present to your favorites. Give Photography and Change a Community.
4.13" x 5.82" 

16pt, FSC credited paper stock

*All orders will ship on Thursdays. Note your order should be placed by 5pm on Wednesday to hit the mail that week.  *** Please note due any order placed after December 19th will not ship until January 2, 2013.  We apologize for the delay.***

name: adopt a camera. Project005
description:
This initiative gives you the opportunity to become a central part of the mission. Your gift will enable one child living in a repressed community to participate in the 100cameras  photography education course. This child will receive their very own camera to document their everyday while learning that their perspective can make a difference.    
Upon completion of the project, 100cameras will send you the child’s biography along with 10 images taken from their perspective.

Adopt-a-Camera is a one time donation of $500.
Question? Contact yes@100cameras.org

name: project001: Sudan "Tots on Pots" Canvas
description:
Beautiful canvas image from our project001 in South Sudan.  This image will bring pure joy to your room and we are proud to say this is one of our all time best selling images.

1.5" frame
Gallery wrapped stretched canvas 

Thank you to our sponsor at Canvas Life Style for their support in printing these images.  Visit them at www.canvaslifestyle.com
